analyzed: visāra dam vāda pathā ati vattinam
sudhā mayūkha amala paṇḍu vaṃsa jam
jīna uyam iddhe amara vhaye pure
sivam padam jāti jarā ādi nissaṭam
vihāya mitte ca sute ca bandhave
upa i t ca nānā taru rāji bhusitam
a sammigānam a gatimhi a same
atha u viditvā vasinaḥ tam āsayam
sadā sataḥ sakya kula ika ketuno
u t uttaya an ucchavikesu tīsu saḥ
a b ujjhi bodhim rajanī parikkhaye
bhayam tirat ca an agate na pīḍayī
mukha udakam ca api adāsi satthuno

original: Gantvā so dhammarājā vanamisipatanaṃ saññatānaṃ niketaṃ,
analyzed: gantvā saḥ dhamma rājā vana misipatanam saññatānam niketam
āsāḷhe puṇṇa māyam sita ruci ruciyā jotite cakkavāḷe
sutvā saddhamma maggam tibhū vana kuhara ābhoga vitthārikam tam
aññāsum magga dhammam parimita rahite cakkavāḷe uḷāro

original: Obhāso pātubhuto sapadi bahuvidhaṃ āsi accherakañca.
Tato paṭṭhāya so satthā vinento devamānuse,
analyzed: tato paṭṭhāya so satthā vinentaḥ deva mānuse

original: Yakkhānaṃ samitiṃ gantvā ṭhatvāna gagane tahiṃ;
analyzed: yakkhānam samitim gantvā ṭhatvāna gagane tahim
laddha abhayehi yakkhehi tehi dinnāya bhumiyā
id hiyā vaḍḍhayitvāna yāva sindhum samantataḥ
giridīpam idha ānetvā patiṭṭhāpesi te tahim
desayitvā jinaḥ dhammam tadā deva samāgame
bahunnam pāṇa koṭīnam dhamma abhisamayam akā

original: Datvā namassituṃ kese agā jetavanaṃ jino.
analyzed: da tvā namassitum kese agāḥ jetavanam jinaḥ
patiṭṭhapetvā te satthu nisinna āsana bhumiyam
inda nīla mayam thūpam karitvā saḥ apūjayi
bodhitaḥ pañcame vasse citta māse mahā muni
tadā samiddhi sumanaḥ devaḥ jetavane ṭhitam
attanaḥ bhavanaṃyā iva rāja āyatana pādapam
inda nīla ddi kūṭam iva gahetvā a tuṭṭha mānasaḥ
dhārayitvā saha agañchi chattam katvāna satthunaḥ
ubhinnam nāga rājūnam vattamāne mahā āhave
sāmaggi karaṇam dhammam abhāsi purisa asabho
tattha āsīnam mahāvīram anna pānehi tappayum
patiṭṭhapetvā saḥ tattha rāja āyatana pādapam
nāga rājassa tassa iva bhavanam sādhu
kalyāṇiyam pañca bhikkhū satehi saha āgami
dibbehi khajja bhojjehi sa saṅgham loka nāyakam
desayitvāna saddhammam sagga mokkha sukha āvaham

original: So satthā sumane kūṭe dassesi padalañchanaṃ.
analyzed: so satthā sumane kūṭe dassesi pada lañchanam
tatas pabbata pādamhi sa saṅghaḥ so vināyako
mahā thūpa ppadese ca viharittha samādhinā
thūpa ārāmamhi thūpassa ṭhāne jhāna sukhena so
sa bhikkhu saṅghaḥ sambuddhaḥ muhuttam vītināmayī
silā thu pappa desamhi ṭha tva kāla vidū muni
a giddhaḥ lābha sakkāre a sayham avamānanam
saṃvat śarāni cattāḷīsan ca pañca ca
desayitvāna sutta ādi navaṅgam satthu sāsanam
desetvā paṭhame yāme mallānam dhammam uttamam

original: Subhaddaṃ majjhime yāme pāpetvā amataṃ padaṃ.
analyzed: su bhaddam majjhime yāme pāpetvā amatam padam
pūjā visesāḥ vattiṃsu deva mānusakāḥ bahū

original: Ahatehi ca vatthehi veṭhetvā paṭhamaṃ jinaṃ;
analyzed: ahatehi ca vatthehi veṭhetvā paṭhamam jinam
mahākassapa therena dhamma rāje a vandite
citakam mā jalittha ati deva dhiṭṭhānato pana

original: Citakaṃ taṃ na sakkhiṃsu gāhāpetuṃ hutāsanaṃ.
analyzed: citakam tam na sakkhiṃsu gāhāpetum huta āsanam
vattha ādīni mahādoṇim citakam ca mahāraham
dvidhā katvāna nikkhamma sa kasīse patiṭṭhitā

original: Na masi satthudehassa daḍḍhassāsi na chārikā.
analyzed: na masi satthu dehassa daḍḍhassa asi na chārikā
dhātuyaḥ avasissiṃsu mutta ābhā kañcana ppabhā

original: Uṇhīsaṃ akkhakā dve ca catasso dantadhātuyo;
analyzed: uṇhīsam akkhakā dve ca catasso dantadhātuyaḥ

original: Iccetā dhātuyo satta vippakiṇṇā na satthuno.
analyzed: iccā itāḥ dhātuyaḥ satta vippakiṇṇāḥ na satthunaḥ
ākāsataḥ patitvā api udgantvā api mahī talā
samantā jala dhārā ayaḥ nibbāpesum citā analam
gīvā dhātum gahetvāna citataḥ mahi yaṅgaṇe

original: Gantvā sake sake raṭṭhe cetiyāni akārayuṃ.
analyzed: gantvā sake sake raṭṭhe cetiyāni akārayuṃ
ekā bhujaṅga rājūhi āsi sakkata pūjitā

original: Dantadhātuṃ tato khemo attanā gahitaṃ adā;
analyzed: dantadhātum tatas khemaḥ attanā gahitam adā

original: Desayitvāna so dhammaṃ bhetvā sabbā kudiṭṭhiyo;
analyzed: desayitvāna saḥ dhammam bhetvā sabbā kudiṭṭhiyaḥ
suvaṇṇa khacita ālamba muttā jālehi sobhitam
kūṭāgāra sata ākīṇṇam taruṇa ādicca sannibham
yānam sagga apavaggassa pasāda atisaya āvaham
dhātu pīṭham ca tattha iva kāretvā
iti saḥ sañcinitvāna puñña sambhāra sampadam
jahitvā mānusam deham sagga kāyam alaṅkari
anujātaḥ tatas tassa kāsi rājavhayaḥ suto
rajjam laddhā amaccānam soka sallam apānudī
puppha gandha ādinā dantadhātum tam abhipūjiya
id ca ivamādim saḥ rājā katvā kusala sañcayam
tassa trajaḥ tatas āsi buddha sāsana māmakaḥ
tatas rajja sirim patvā anugaṇhi mahājanam
sa parattha anabhiññe saḥ lābha sakkāra lolupe
māyāvinaḥ a vid jandhe niganṭhe samupaṭṭhahi
na asakkhī guṇa raṃsīhi jalitum saḥ narāsabhaḥ
dhamma maggāḥ apete pi paviṭṭhe diṭṭhi kānanam
tasmin sādhu patham aññe na ativattiṃsu pāṇinaḥ
maṅgala tthuti ghosehi nacca gīta ādikehi ca
hema rūpiya pupphehi gandha cuṇṇa ādikehi ca
ugghāṭetvā narindo saḥ pāsāde siha pañjaram
passantaḥ jana mad dakkhī pūjā vidhi parāyaṇam
kotuhala ākulaḥ hutvā idam vacanam abravī
accherakam kim etat nu kīdisam pāṭihāriyam
mama etam nagaram kasmāt chaṇa nissitakam iti
tatas amaccaḥ ācikkhi medhāvī buddha māmakaḥ
rājinaḥ tassa sambuddha anubhāvam a vijānataḥ
esā dhātu mahā rāja khemattherena āhaṭā

original: Taṃ dhātuṃ pūjayitvāna rājāno pubbakā idha;
analyzed: tam dhātum pūjayitvāna rājānaḥ pubbakāḥ idha
kalyāṇa mitte nissāya deva kāyam upāgamum
nāgarā api ime sabbe samparāya su katthikā

original: Pūjayanti samāgamma dhātuṃ taṃ satthuno iti.
Tassāmaccassa so rājā sutvā dhammaṃ subhāsitaṃ;
analyzed: tassa amaccassa saḥ rājā sutvā dhammam su bhāsitaṃ
dulladdhī malam ujjhitvā pasīdi rata nattaye

original: Dhātupūjaṃ karonto so rājā acchariyā vahaṃ;
analyzed: dhātu pūjam karontaḥ saḥ rājā acchariyā vaham
ime ahirikā sabbe saddhā ādi guṇa vajjitā
thaddhā saṭhā ca duppaññā saggamokkha vibandhakā

original: Pabbājesi sakā raṭṭhā nigaṇṭhe te asesake.
analyzed: pabbājesi sakā raṭṭhā nigaṇṭhe te asesake
tatas nigṇṭhā sabbe pi ghata sitta analāḥ yathā
tattha rājā mahā tejaḥ jambudīpassa issaraḥ
kodhandhā atha nigaṇṭhāḥ te sabbe pesuñña kārakā
siva brahma ādayaḥ deve niccam tumhe namassatha

original: Nindanno tādise deve chavaṭṭhiṃ vandate iti.
analyzed: nindan no tādise deve chavaṭṭhim vandate iti
sutvāna vacanam rājā kodha vasa anugaḥ
sūram sāmanta bhūpālam cittayānam atha bravī

original: Pūjitaṃ taṃ chavaṭṭhiñca tena rattindivaṃ iti.

analyzed: sannaya hitvā sakam senam purā tamhā abhinikkhami

original: Sutvā āgamanaṃ tassa kaliṅgo so mahipati;
analyzed: sutvā āgamanam tassa kaliṅgaḥ saḥ mahipati

original: Tato so sumano gantvā paviṭṭho rājamandiraṃ;
analyzed: tato so sumanaḥ gantvā paviṭṭhaḥ rāja mandiram
pasanna mukha vaṇṇā uva cittayānam samabravī
sabba loka hita atthāya maṃsa netta ādi dānataḥ
an appakappe sambhāre sambharitvā a tanditaḥ
jetvā namucino senam patvā sabba asava kkhayam
diṭṭha dhamma su kassādam a gaṇetvāna attanaḥ
dhamma nāvāya tāresi janatam yaḥ bhavaṇṇavā
devātidevam tam buddham saraṇam sabba pāṇinam

original: Jano hi avajānanto addhā so vañcito iti.
analyzed: janaḥ hi avajānantaḥ addhā saḥ vañcitaḥ iti
icca ivamādim sutvāna saḥ rājā satthu vaṇṇanam
ānanda ssu pabandhehi pavedesi pasanna tam
guhasīvas pasannam tam citta yānam udikkhiya

original: Tena saddhiṃ mahagghaṃ taṃ agamā dhātumandiraṃ.
analyzed: tena saddhim mahaggham tam agamā dhātu mandiram
inda nīla kavāṭehi maṇi kiṅkiṇikāhi ca
sovaṇṇa kaṇṇa mālāhi sobhitam maṇi thūpikam
mahī tale nihantvāna dakkhiṇam jānu maṇḍalam
añjalim paggahetvāna guṇe dasa bala ādike
pubba kāya ādi nikkhanta jala anala samākulam
cakka vāḷaṅgaṇam katvā janā sabbe pasāditā
chatta vāmara saṅkha ādi gāhakehi anekadhā
brahma deva asura ādīhi pūjitena tayā pana
ṭhatvāna maṇi sopāṇe vissa kamma abhinimmite
pāṭihāriya majja api saggamokkha sukha āvaham
abbhuk gantvā gagaṇa kuharam canda lekhā abhirāmā

original: Accheraṃ taṃ parama ruciraṃ cittayāno narindo,
analyzed: acchā iram tam parama ruciram cittayānaḥ narindo
disvā haṭṭhaḥ cira paricitam diṭṭhi jālam jahitvā
gantvā buddham saraṇam asamam sabba seṇīhi saddhim
aggam puññam pasavi bahudhā dhātu sammānanāya

original: Taṃ sāsanaṃ paṇḍunarādhipassa ñāpesi dhīro duratikkamaṃ’ti.
analyzed: tam sāsanam paṇḍu narādhipassa ñāpesi dhīraḥ duratikkamam ti

original: Rājātato dantapuraṃ dhajehi pupphehi dhūpehi ca toraṇehi;
analyzed: rājā atatas dantapuram dhajehi pupphehi dhūpehi ca toraṇehi
assu pabandha āvuta locanehi purakkhataḥ negama nāgarehi

original: Samubbahanto sirasā nijena mahārahaṃ dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ taṃ.
analyzed: samubbahantaḥ sirasā nijena mahā raham dhātu karaṇḍakam tam
ratham nava adicca samāna vaṇṇa mā āruyha citta ttharaṇa abhirāmam
aneka saṅkhehi balehi saddhim velā ativat tambudhi sannibhehi
nivattamānassa bahujjanassa vinā api deham manasā anuyātaḥ
su santhatam sabba adhi vālukāhi su sajjitam puṇṇa ghaṭa ādikehi
puppha abhikiṇṇam paṭipajji dīgham su vitthatam pāṭaliputta maggam

original: Kaliṅghanātho kusumādikehi naccehi gītehi ca vāditehi;
analyzed: kusuma ādikehi naccehi gītehi ca vāditehi

original: Dine dine addhani dantadhātuṃ pūjesi saddhiṃ vanadevatāhi.
analyzed: dine dine addhani dantadhātum pūjesi saddhim vana devatāhi
su duggamam sindhu mahīdharehi maddhānam atikkamitvā

original: Ādāya dhātuṃ manujādhinātho agā puraṃ pāṭali puttanāmaṃ.
analyzed: ādāya dhātum manuja adhināthaḥ agāḥ puram pāṭali putta nāmam

original: Rājādhirājo’tha sabhāya majjhe disvāna taṃ vītabhayaṃ visaṅkaṃ;
analyzed: rāja adhirājaḥ utha sabhāya majjhe disvāna tam vīta bhayam visaṅkam
kaliṅga rājam paṭigha abhibhutaḥ abhāsi pesuñña kare nigaṇṭhe
aṅgāra rāsimhi sajoti bhūte nikkhippa khippam dahatha adhunā iti
pahaṭṭha citta avatataḥ nigaṇṭhā rājaṅgaṇe te mahatim gabhīram
samantataḥ pajjalitāya tāya sajotiyāḥ roruva bheravāya

original: Mohandhabhutā atha titthiyā te taṃ dantadhātuṃ abhinikkhipiṃsu.
analyzed: atha titthiyā te tam dantadhātum abhinikkhipiṃsu
tassa anubhāvena tam aggīra asim hetvā sarojam ratha cakka mattam
samantataḥ uggata reṇu jāla kiñjakkha bhara abhirāmam

original: Tasmiṃ khaṇe paṅkaja kaṇṇikāya patiṭṭhahitvā jinadantadhātu;
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe paṅkaja kaṇṇikāya patiṭṭhahitvā jina danta dhātu

original: Kundāvadātāhi pabhāhi sabbā disā pabhāsesi pabhassarāhi.
analyzed: kunda avadātāhi pabhāhi sabbā disā pabhāsesi pabhassarāhi

original: Disvāna taṃ acchariyaṃ manussā pasannacittā ratanādikehi;
analyzed: disvāna tam acchariyam manussāḥ pasanna cittāḥ ratana ādikehi
sampūjayitvā jina dantadhātum sakam sakam diṭṭhim avossajiṃsu

original: So paṇḍurājā pana diṭṭhijālaṃ cirānubaddhaṃ apariccajanto;
analyzed: so paṇḍu rājā pana diṭṭhi jālam cira anubaddham a pariccajanto
nimuggā adhikaraññam esā upaḍḍha bhāge na ca dissamānā

original: Pubbācalaṭṭho’va sudhāmarīci jotesi raṃsīhi disā samantā.
analyzed: pubbācalaṭṭhaḥ uva sudhā marīci jotesi raṃsīhi disā samantā

original: Disvānubhāvaṃ jinadantadhātu yāpajji so vimbhaya maggarājā;
analyzed: disvā anubhāvam jina danta dhātu yā apajji saḥ magga rājā

original: Eko’tha issāpasuto nigaṇṭho taṃ rājarājānamidaṃ avoca.
analyzed: ekothaḥ issāpa sutaḥ nigaṇṭhaḥ tam rāja rājānam idam avoca

original: Rāmādayo deva janaddanassa nānāvatārā bhuvane ahesuṃ;
analyzed: rāma ādayaḥ deva janaddanassa nānā avatārāḥ bhuvane ahesuṃ
tassa ika desaḥ caḥ idam cha va ṭṭhinaḥ ca inu bhāvaḥ katham īdisaḥ iti

original: Addhā manussattamupāgatassa devassa pacchā tidivaṃ gatassa;
analyzed: addhā manussattam upāgatassa devassa pacchā tidivam gatassa
deha ikadesaḥ ṭhapitaḥ hi tattham etat ti saccam vacanam bhaveyya

original: Yaṭicchitaṃ gaṇhatha vatthujātaṃ iccāha rājā mukhare nigaṇṭhe.
analyzed: yaṭicchitam gaṇhatha vatthu jātam id ca āha rājā mukhare nigaṇṭhe

original: Te titthiyā viṇahusuraṃ guṇehi vicitta rūpehi abhitthavitvā;
analyzed: te titthiyāḥ viṇahusuram guṇehi rūpehi abhitthavitvā

original: Toyena siñciṃsu saṭhā tathāpi ṭhitappadesā na calittha dhātu.
analyzed: toyena siñciṃsu tathā api ṭhita ppadesā na calittha dhātu

original: Jigucchamāno atha te nigaṇṭhe so dhātuyānīharaṇe upāyaṃ;
analyzed: jigucchamānaḥ atha te nigaṇṭhe saḥ dhātuyānī haraṇe upāyam

original: Anvesamāno vasudhādhinātho bheriṃ carāpesi sake puramhi.
analyzed: anvesamānaḥ vasudhā adhināthaḥ bherim sake puramhi
nimuggam ettha adhikarañña majji yaḥ dhātum etam bahis nīhareyya
sutvā na tam bheri ravam uḷāram puñaññatthikaḥ buddha bala pasannaḥ

original: Tasmiṃ pure seṭṭhisuto subhaddo pāvekkhirañño samitiṃ pagabbho.
analyzed: tasmim pure seṭṭhi sutaḥ subhaddaḥ samitim pagabbhaḥ

original: Tamaggarājaṃ atha so namitvā sāmājikānaṃ hadayaṅgamāya;
analyzed: tam agga rājam atha saḥ namitvā hadayaṅgamāya
bhāsāya sabbaññu guṇa ppabhāvam vaṇṇesi citto

original: Bhumiṃ kiṇitvā mahatā dhanena manoramaṃ jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ;
analyzed: bhumim kiṇitvā mahatā dhanena manoramam jetavanam vihāram

original: Yo kārayitvāna jinassa datvā upaṭṭhahi taṃ catupaccayehi.
analyzed: yaḥ kārayitvāna jinassa da tvā upaṭṭhahi tam catu paccayehi
tiloka nāthe mama dhamma rāje tumhedhunā āpassatha bhatti bhāram
ittham naditvāna pahūta pañeññā katvāna ekaṃsam athuttarīyam
mahī talam dakkhiṇa jānukena āhatca baddhañjalikaḥ avoca

original: Chaddantanāgo savisena viddho sallena yo lohitamakkhi taṅgo;
analyzed: chaddanta nāgaḥ sa visena viddhaḥ sallena yaḥ lohita makkhi taṅgaḥ

original: Chabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi samujjalante chetvāna luddāya adāsi dante.
analyzed: chabbaṇṇa raṃsīhi samujjalante chetvāna luddāya adāsi dante
hutvāna visuddha sīlaḥ ajjhatta dāna abhirataḥ dvijāya

original: Yo bodhiyā bāhiravatthudānā atittarūpo sivirāja seṭṭho;
analyzed: yaḥ bodhiyā bāhira vatthu dānā sivi rāja seṭṭhaḥ

original: Adāsi cakkhūni pabhassarāni dvijāya jiṇṇāya acakkhukāya.
analyzed: adāsi cakkhūni pabhassarāni dvijāya jiṇṇāya acakkhukāya

original: Yo dhammapālo api sattamāsa jātopaduṭṭhe janakesakamhi;
analyzed: yaḥ dhamma pālaḥ api satta māsa jāta upaduṭṭhe jana kesakamhi

original: Kārāpayante asimālakammaṃ cittaṃ na dūsesi patāparāje.
analyzed: kārāpayante asim āla kammam cittam na dūsesi patāpa rāje

original: Sākhāmigo yo asatā pumena vane papātā sayamuddhaṭena;
analyzed: sākhā amigaḥ yaḥ asatā pumena vane papāta sayam uddhaṭena

original: Silāya bhinne’pi sake lalāṭe taṃ khemabhumiṃ anayitthamūḷhaṃ.
analyzed: bhinne ipi sake lalāṭe tam khema bhumim
ruṭṭhena mārena abhinimmitam pi aṅgāraka asum jalitam vihijja

original: Samuṭṭhite sajjumahāravinde ṭhatvāna yo seṭṭhi adāsi dānaṃ.

analyzed: migena yena apevijaññam ekam bhītam vadhā mocayitum kuraṅgim
āghātane atta siraṃṭha petvāpamocita añññapi pāṇi saṅghā

original: Yo sattavasso visikhāya paṃsu kīḷāparo sambhavanāmako’pi;
analyzed: yaḥ satta vassaḥ visikhāya sambhava nāmakaḥ api

original: Hitvā nikantiṃ sakajīvite’pi baddhāsakucchimhi ca vettavalliṃ;
analyzed: hitvā nikantim saka jīvite pi ca vetta vallim
sākhā mige neka sahassa saṅkhe vadha apamocesi kapissaroyo
dhamma sudhā rasena yaḥ mānuse tuṇḍila sūkaraḥ api

original: Isī’va katvā atha ñāyaganthaṃ nijaṃ pavattesi cirāya dhammaṃ.
analyzed: isi iva katvā atha ñāya gantham nijam pavattesi cirāya dhammam
paccatthikam puṇṇaka yakkha muggam mahiddhikam kāma guṇesu giddham
kula avasāyi a virūḍha pakkhaḥ yaḥ buddhimā vaṭṭa kapotakaḥ api
saccena dāvaggim abhijjalantam vassena nibbāpayi vāridaḥ uva
yaḥ maccha rājā api tasi tekilante
saccena vākyena mahogha puṇṇam muhutta mattena akāsi raṭṭham

original: Buddho bhavitvā api diṭṭhadhamma sukhānapekkho karuṇānuvattī;
analyzed: buddhaḥ bhavitvā api diṭṭhadhamma sukha anapekkhaḥ karuṇā anuvattī
sabbam sahantaḥ avamānana ādim yaḥ dukkaram loka hitam akāsi

original: Ajeyyasatthaṃ paramiddhipattaṃ damesi yo ālavakampī yakkhaṃ.
analyzed: ajeyya sattham param iddhi pattam damesi yaḥ ālava kampī yakkham

original: Bhetvāna diṭṭhiṃ sucirānubaddhaṃ damesi yo brahmavaraṃ munindo.
analyzed: bhetvāna diṭṭhim su cira anubaddham damesi yaḥ brahma varam muni ndo
dhāvantam agge dhanapāla hatthim damesi yaḥ dāruṇam antakam iva
manussarat tāruṇa pāṇi pādam ukkhippa khaggam anubandhamānam

original: Mahādayo duppasahaṃ parehi damesi yo aṅgulimālacoraṃ.
analyzed: mahā ādayaḥ duppasaham parehi damesi yaḥ aṅguli māla coram
yaḥ dhamma rājā vijita ari saṅghaḥ pavattayantaḥ vara dhamma cakkam

original: Saddhamma saññaṃ ratanākarañca ogāhayī saṃ parisaṃ samaggaṃ.
analyzed: saddhamma saññam ratanākarañca ogāhayī sam parisam samaggam
tassa iva saddhamma vara adhipassa tathāgatassa paṭi puggalassa
ananta ñāṇassa visāradassa esā mahā kāruṇikassa dhātu

original: Anena saccena jinassa dhātu khippaṃ samāruyha nabhantarāḷaṃ;
analyzed: anena saccena jinassa dhātu khippam samāruyha nabhantarāḷam
su dhaṃsu lekhā iva samujjalanti kaṅkham vinodetu mahājanassa

original: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sā jinadantadhātu nabhaṃ samuggamma pabhāsayantī;
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe sā jina danta dhātu nabham samuggamma pabhāsayantī

original: Sabbā disā osadhitārakā’va janaṃ pasādesi vtiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ.
analyzed: sabbāḥ disāḥ osadhi tārakā ava janam pasādesi vtiṇṇa kaṅkham

original: Athotaritvā gaganaṅgaṇamhā sā matthake seṭṭhisutassa tassa;

analyzed: sudhā abhisitta gattam iva tam bhatti tinnam

original: Dasvāna taṃ acchariyaṃ nigaṇṭhā iccabravuṃ paṇḍunarādhipaṃ taṃ;
analyzed: dasvāna tam acchariyam nigaṇṭha iccabravum paṇḍu narādhipam tam

original: Vijjābalaṃ seṭṭhisutassa etaṃ na dhātuyā deva ayampabhāvo.
analyzed: vijjā balam seṭṭhi sutassa etam na dhātuyā deva ayampabhāvaḥ

original: Nisamma tesaṃ vacanaṃ narindo iccabravī seṭṭhisutaṃ subhaddaṃ;
analyzed: nisamma tesam vacanam narindo iccabravī seṭṭhi sutam su bhaddam

original: Yathā ca ete abhisaddaheyyuṃ tathāvidhaṃ dassaya iddhimaññaṃ.
analyzed: yathā ca ete abhisaddaheyyum tathāvidham dassayaḥ iddhimaññam
tatas subhaddaḥ tapanīya patte sugandhi sīta udaka pūritamhi
vaḍḍhesi dhātum muni puṅgavassa anussarantaḥ carita bhutāni

original: Sā rājahaṃ sī’va vidhāvamānā sugandhitoyamhi padakkhiṇena;
analyzed: sā sīva vidhāvamānā sugandhi toyamhi padakkhiṇena

original: Ummujjamānā ca nimujjamānā jane pamodassudhare akāsi.
analyzed: ummujjamānā ca nimujjamānā jane pamodassudhare akāsi

original: Tato ca kāsuṃ visikhāyamajjhe katvā tahiṃ dhātumabhikkhipitvā;
analyzed: tato ca kāsum visikhāya majjhe katvā tahim dhātum abhikkhipitvā

original: Paṃsūhi sammā abhipūrayitvā bahūhi maddāpayi kuñjarehi.

analyzed: bhetvā cakka mattam virājamānam maṇi kaṇṇikāya
pabhassaram rūpiya kesarehi saroruham kañcana patta pāḷim

original: Obhāsayanti’va disā pabhāhi diṭṭhā muhuttena jinassadhātu.
analyzed: obhāsayanti iva disā pabhāhi diṭṭhāḥ muhuttena

original: Khipiṃsu vatthābharaṇāni maccā pavassayuṃ pupphamayañca vassaṃ;
analyzed: khipiṃsu vattha ābharaṇāni maccā pavassayum puppha mayam ca vassam

original: Ukkuṭṭhisaddehi ca sadhukāranādehi puṇṇaṃ nagaraṃ akaṃsu.
analyzed: ukkuṭṭhi saddehi ca sadhukāra nādehi puṇṇam nagaram akaṃsu

original: Te titthiyā taṃ abhivañcanaṃ’ti rājādhirājaṃ atha saññapetvā;
analyzed: te titthiyā tam rāja adhirājam atha saññapetvā

original: Jigucchanīye kuṇapādikehi khipiṃsu dhātuṃ parikhāya piṭṭhe.
analyzed: jigucchanīye kuṇapa ādikehi dhātum parikhāya piṭṭhe

original: Madhubbatālī virutābhirāmā ahosi sā pokkharaṇī’va nandā.
analyzed: madhubbatālī viruta abhirāmā ahosi sā pokkharaṇī iva nandā

original: Gajādhipā koññcaravaṃ raviṃsu kariṃsu hesāninadaṃ turaṅgā;
analyzed: gaja adhipā koññcaravam raviṃsu kariṃsu hesā ninadam turaṅgā
ukkuṭṭhi nādam maccā su vāditāḥ dundubhi ādayaḥ api

original: Vatthāni sīse bhamayiṃsu mattā bhujāni poṭhesumudaggacittā.

analyzed: dhūpehi kālāgaru sambhavehi ghana avanaddham iva nabham
samussita aneka dhaja āvalīhi puram tadā āsi
disvā āmodita a macca gaṇā samaggā

original: Atthe niyojetu mupecca tassa vadiṃsu paṇḍussa narādhipassa.
analyzed: atthe niyojetu mupecca tassa vadiṃsu paṇḍussa narādhipassa

original: Disvāna yo īdisakampi rāja iddhānubhāvaṃ munipuṅgavassa;
analyzed: disvāna yaḥ īdisakam pi rājaḥ iddha anubhāvam muni puṅgavassa

original: Pasādamattampi kareyya noce kimatthiyā tassa bhaveyya paññā.
analyzed: pasāda mattam pi kareyya no ce kim atthiyā tassa bhaveyya paññā

original: Pasādanīyesu guṇesu rāja pasādanaṃ sādhujanassa dhammo;
analyzed: pasādanīyesu guṇesu rāja pasādanam sādhu janassa dhammaḥ

original: Pupphanti sabbe sayameva vande samuggate komudakānanāni.
analyzed: pupphanti sabbe sayam eva vande samuggate komuda kānanāni

original: Vācāya tesaṃ pana dummatīnaṃ mā saggamaggaṃ pajahittha rāja;
analyzed: vācāya tesam pana dummatīnam mā sagga maggam pajahittha rāja

original: Andhe gahetvā vicareyya ko hi anvesamāno supathaṃ amūḷho.
analyzed: andhe gahetvā vicareyya kaḥ hi anvesamānaḥ su patham a mūḍhaḥ

original: Narādhipā kappiṇa bimbisāra suddhodanādi api tejavantā;
analyzed: narādhipā kappiṇa bimbisāra suddhodana ādi api tejavantā

original: Taṃ dhammarājaṃ saraṇaṃ upecca piviṃsu dhammāmatamādarena.
analyzed: tam dhammarājam saraṇam upecca piviṃsu dhamma amatam ādarena
sahassanettaḥ tidasa adhipaḥ api khīṇāyukaḥ khiṇa bhavam munindam

original: Upecca dhammaṃ vimalaṃ nisamma alattha āyuṃ api diṭṭhadhammo.
analyzed: upecca dhammam vimalam nisamma alattha āyum api diṭṭha dhammaḥ
tasmin jita pañca māre devātideve vara dhamma rāje
sagga apavagga adhigamāya khippam cittam pasādehi nara adhirāja

original: Senāpatiṃ atthavaraṃ avoca pahaṭṭhabhāvo parisāya majjhe.
analyzed: senāpatim attha varam avoca pahaṭṭha bhāvaḥ parisāya majjhe
asat dahānaḥ guṇe bhava chedana kāraṇassa

original: Cirāya dulladdhipathe caranto ṭhito sarajje api vañcitohaṃ.
analyzed: cirāya dulladdhi pathe carantaḥ ṭhitaḥ sa rajje api vañcitaḥ uham

original: Mohena khajjopanakaṃ dhamesiṃ sītaddito dhumasikhe jalante;
analyzed: mohena khajjopanakam dhamesim sītadditaḥ dhuma sikhe jalante

original: Pipāsito sindhujalaṃ pahāya piviṃ pamādena marīcitoyaṃ.
analyzed: pipāsitaḥ sindhu jalam pahāya pivim pamādena marīci toyam

original: Pariccajitvā amataṃ cirāya jivatthiko tikkhavisaṃ akhādiṃ;
analyzed: pariccajitvā amatam cirāya jivatthiko tikkha visam akhādiṃ
campaka puppha dāmam adhārayim jattusu nāga bhāram

original: Gantvāna khippaṃ parikhā samīpaṃ ārādhayitvā jinadantadhātuṃ;
analyzed: gantvāna khippam parikhā samīpam ārādhayitvā jina dantadhātum

original: Ānehi pūjāvidhinā karissaṃ puññāni sabbattha sukhāvahāni.
analyzed: ānehi pūjā vidhinā karissam puññāni sabbattha sukha āvahāni
gantvā ātateso parikhā samīpam senādhinātho parama patītaḥ

original: Dhātuṃ munindassa namassamāno ajjhesi rañño hitamā caranto
analyzed: dhātum munindassa namassamānaḥ ajjhesi raññaḥ hitamā carantaḥ

original: Cirāgataṃ diṭṭhimalaṃ pahāya alattha saddhaṃ sugate narindo;
analyzed: cira āgatam diṭṭhi malam pahāya alattha saddham sugate narindo
pāsādam āgamma pasādam assa vaḍḍhehi raññaḥ

original: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pokkharaṇī vicittā phullehi sovaṇṇasaroruhehi;
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe pokkharaṇī vicittā phullehi sovaṇṇa saroruhehi
alaṅkarontī gaganam mandākinī iva abhinava avatārā

original: Kundāvadātāhi pabhāhi sabbaṃ khirodakucchiṃ’va puraṃ akāsi.
analyzed: kunda avadātāhi pabhāhi sabbam puram akāsi
tatas su ratta ñjali paṅkajamhi patiṭṭhahitvāna camu patissa

original: Sandissamānā mahatā janena mahapphalaṃ mānusakaṃ akattha.
analyzed: sandissamānā mahatā janena mahapphalam mānusakam akattha
sutvāna vuttantam imam narindo pahaṭṭha bhāvā upadasāva gantvā
vohāra dakkhāḥ manujāḥ muninda saṅghaṭṭayitvā nikasā upalamhi
karonti aggham vara kañcanassa eso hi dhammo carito purāṇo
pāpenti rājañña kirīṭa koṭim vibhu sanattam

original: Vīmaṃsanatthāya tavādhunāpi mayā kataṃ sabbamidaṃ muninda;
analyzed: vīmaṃsana atthāya tava adhunā api mayā katam sabbam idam muninda

original: Āguṃ mahantaṃ khama bhuripañña khippaṃ mamālaṅkuru uttamaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: āgum mahantam khama bhuripañña khippam mama alaṅkuru uttamaṅgam

original: Patiṭṭhitā tassa tato kirīṭe maṇippabhā bhāsini dantadhātu;
analyzed: patiṭṭhitā tassa tatas kirīṭe maṇi pabhā bhāsini dantadhātu

original: Amuñci raṃsī dhavalā pajāsu sinehajātā iva khīradhārā.
analyzed: amuñci raṃsī dhavalā pajāsu sineha jātā iva khīra dhārā
saḥ dantadhātum sirasā avahantaḥ padakkhiṇam tam nagaram karitvā
sampūjayantaḥ kusuma ādikehi su sajjita ante puram āharittha
samussita udāra sita ātapatte pallaṅka seṭṭhe

original: Patiṭṭhapetvāna jinassa dhātuṃ pūjesi rājā ratanādikehi.
analyzed: jinassa dhātum pūjesi rājā ratana ādikehi

original: Hitvā vihiṃsaṃ karuṇādhivāso ārādhayī sabbajanaṃ guṇehi.
analyzed: hitvā vihiṃsam karuṇā adhivāsaḥ ārādhayī sabba janam guṇehi
kāresi nānā ratana ppabhāhi sahassa raṃsīm iva virocamānam
narādhipaḥ bhatti bhara anurūpam dhātu nivesanam pi

original: Vaḍḍhesi so dhātugharamhi dhātuṃ alaṅkaritvā sakalaṃ purampi;
analyzed: vaḍḍhesi saḥ dhātu gharamhi dhātum alaṅkaritvā sakalam puram pi

original: Sesena pūjāvidhinā atitto pūjesi raṭṭhaṃ sadhanaṃ sabhoggaṃ.
analyzed: sesena pūjā vidhinā atittaḥ pūjesi raṭṭham sa dhanam sa bhoggam
āmantayitvā guhasīva rājam sammānitam atta samam karitvā
dāna ādikam puññam aneka rūpam saddhā dhano sañciṇi rāja seṭṭhaḥ
tatas saḥ bhupālaḥ kumati jana saṃsaggam anayam
nirākatvā magge sugata vacana ujjota sugame
padhāvantaḥ sammā sa para hita sampatti caturaḥ
carati dharaṇi pāle rāja dhammesu tasmin
samara catura senaḥ khīra dhāraḥ narindo
kari varam atha disvā saḥ guhā dvāra yātam
nija nagara samīpa āyātam etam narindam
amita balam a mahā oghena uttharantā abhiyāyi
udita bahaḷa dhūlī pāḷiḥ uddhanta ḷikkho
sa mada vividha yodha ārāva saṃrambha bhīme
nisita sarasa tālī vassa dhārā karāḷe
ajini mahati yuddhe paṇḍukaḥ khīra dhāram
su carita m abhirūpam sañciṇantaḥ vihāsi
dasabala tanu dhātum pūjitum tassa rañño

original: Nikhila guṇa nivāso so kumāro karitvā;
analyzed: nikhila guṇa nivāsaḥ saḥ kumāraḥ karitvā
vadana jita sarojā hāri dhammilla bhārā
kuca bhara namitaṅgi hema mālā abhidhānā
akhila guṇa nidhānam bandhu bhāva anurūpam
su vimala kula jātam tam kumāram viditvā
adadi sa bahu mānam rāja puttassa tassa
pacuḥ a parijanam tam sabbathā yojayitvā
upa puram upagañchum dhātuyāḥ gaṇhana attham
atha nagara samīpe te nivesam karitvā
sugata dasana dhātum dehi vā khippam amham
avadi rahasi vācam rāja puttassa tassa

original: Nahi sati mama dehe dhātumaññassa dassaṃ,
analyzed: nahi sati mama dehe dhātumaññassa dassam

original: Ahamapi yadi jetuṃ neva te sakkuṇeyyaṃ.
analyzed: aham api yadi jetum na iva te sakkuṇeyyam
iti vacanam udāram mātulaḥ sā atha sutvā

original: Tavaca mamaca ko vā sīhaḷe bandhubhūto,
analyzed: tavaca mamaca kaḥ vā sīhaḷe bandhu bhūtaḥ
jina varaṇa saroje bhatti yutto ca
jalanīdhi para tīre sīhaḍam khudda desam
bhava bhaya hati dakkhaḥ vattate satthu dhammaḥ
gaṇana patham atītāḥ bhikkhavaḥ ca avasiṃsu

original: Mama ca piyasahāyo so mahāsena rājā,
analyzed: mama ca piya sahāyaḥ saḥ mahāsena rājā
jina caraṇa saroja dvanda sevā abhiyuttaḥ
salilam api ca phuṭṭham dhātuyā patthayantaḥ
vividha vibhava dānā sādhu saṅgaṇhitum ca
nija duhitu patim tam ittham ārādhayitvā
raṇa dharaṇim upetaḥ saḥ kumārehi saddhim
atha narapati putto danta nāmaḥ suṇitvā

original: Turita turita bhūto so puramhā paḷāyi.
analyzed: turita turita bhūtaḥ saḥ puramhā paḷāyi
sarabhasam upagantvā dakkhiṇam ca atha desam
bhariyam api gahetvā āgataḥ tattha khippam
vividha kiraṇa jālam vālukā rāsi thūpā
a viraḍitam udentam dhātuyā tāya disvā
muni sutam atha disvā jampatī te
dasa bala tanu dhātum sīhaḷam netha tumhe
api ca gamana magge jāta matte vighāte
sa ratha mamam aneka upaddava cheda dakkham
punar api tad anurūpam desayitvāna dhammam
puthutaram apanetvā soka sallam ca gāḍham
bhujaga bhavana vāsī ninnagāya atha tassā
samupagami tadā tam ṭhānam icchā vasena
ṭhitam atha muni dhātum vālukā rasi gabbhe
kim idam iti sa kaṅkham pekkhamānaḥ avedi
sapadi sa bahu mānaḥ saḥ a sandissamānaḥ
ratana maya karaṇḍam dhātu yuttam gilitvā
pulina tala gatam tam dantadhātum a disvā
nayana salila dhāram soka jātam kirantā
atha sugata sutaḥ saḥ cintitam saṃviditvā
agami savidham esam soka dina ānanānam
asuṇi ca jina dhātum vālukāra asi majjhe
nīhitam api a diṭṭham pūjitam jampatīhi
jaladhim ati gabhīram tam dvidhā saḥ karitvā
sarabhasa mahi dhāvam bhīma saṃrambha yogā
sa rabhasa m upagantvā tassa pāde namitvā
sakala jana hitattham eva jāyanti buddhāḥ
muni vara tanu dhātum tena dehi iti vuttaḥ
bhujaga pate karaṇḍam dhātu gabbham adajji
iti kata bahu kāre saṃyaminde payāte
mahati vipina deva ādīhi magge payutte
vividha maha vidhāne te tatas nikkhamiṃsu
mudu surabhī samīraḥ kaṇṭaka ādi vyapetaḥ
vimala pulina hārī āsi sabbattha maggaḥ
sa kutukam anuyātā kānane devatā hī
acala padara baddham su ṭṭhita udāra kūpam
sayam abhimata laṅkā gāminim nāvam ete
atha dija pavarā te sīhaḷam gantum iccham
suti sukha vacasā saḥ sādhu vuttena ca īsam
sama surabhi manuññaḥ uttaraḥ vāyi vātaḥ
nayana visaya bhāva atīta tīra acala ādim
pavisi jaladhi majjham pheṇa puppha abhikiṇṇam
atha abhavi samuddaḥ bhīma saṃvaṭṭa vātā
bhī hata sikhari kūṭa ākāra vīci ppabandho
savana bhidura ghora ārāva rundhanta likkho
salilanidhi jalam tam santa kallola mālam
phuṭa kumuda kalāpe jattunā eke vahantā
rucira kaṇaka cuṇṇā puṇṇa caṅgoṭa hatthā
muni vara tanu dhātum pūjitum uṭṭhahiṃsu
rucira kaca kalāpā rāja kaññāya tassā
paṭira vahari tānam sādhuvāda ādi kānam
phaṇadhara nivahā te tam tarim vārayitvā
bhaya vilulita cittā jampatī te samaggā
dasa bala tanu jam tam iddhimantam sariṃsu
bhaya cakita bhujaṅge te paḷāpesi khippam

original: Itthaṃ buddhisute bhujaṅgajanitaṃ bhītiṃ sametvā gate,
analyzed: ittham buddhi sute bhujaṅga janitam bhītim sametvā gate

original: Sā nāvā pavanā pakampitadhajā tuṅgaṃ taraṅgāvaliṃ;
analyzed: sā nāvā pavanā pakampita dhajā tuṅgam taraṅga āvalim
bhīndantī gati vegasā puthutaram megha āvalī sannibham
laṅkā paṭṭanam otarittha sahasā therassa tad siddhiyā
ratti kkhaye ca anurādha purassa maggam
ādāya te dasana dhātu varam jinassa

original: Sabbā disā ca vidisā ca ghanandhakārā
analyzed: sabbā disā ca vidisā ca ghana andhakārā
rajjeṭhitassa rata natta ya māma kattam
vassena nibbuta mahā dahanā ava kacchā
te jampatī samabhavum hata soka tāpā
haṭṭhaḥ yathā mata rasena hi sitta gattaḥ
rājā vasanta samaye saha kāminī hi
tam vippasanna mukha vaṇṇam apassi bhikkhum
sutvāna tam parama pīti bharam vahantaḥ
sampatta cakka ratanā uva ahosi rājā
mā ādāya jāni patayaḥ ubhaye samet ca
āsāya tam sapadi megha girim vihāram
saddhaḥ agañchi pada sāva pasanna cittaḥ
siñcam vidhāya paṇidhim bahu māna pubbam
etam pahūta ratanam sa dhanam sa bhoggam
pūjam karomi tad anucchavikam aham iti
cinteyya kaḥ hi bhuvanesu a mūḍha titto
laṅkā adhipaccam idam appataram mama asi
saḥ aham paritta vibhavaḥ tibhava eka nātham
āpajji saḥ dhiti yutaḥ api visaññi bhāvam
pūjesi sabbam api sīhaḷa dīpam etam
vatthu ttaya ika saraṇāḥ api poḥ ra vaggāḥ
tam jāti puppha nikarena thakesi rājā
khīra uda eṇe paṭala ppaṭime dukuḷe
bhiyyas api saḥ upaparikkhitu kāma tāya
sa itambuda udara viniggata candimā ava
tasmin khaṇe vasumatī saha bhūdhara ihi
tam ap bhūtam viya samekkhitum amburā asi
gāyiṃsu gīta mamatā āsana gāyakā api
ditta aci rajju tipa dīpa sata avabhāsā
seda uda bindu gaṇa saṃharaṇa ppavīṇaḥ
lokussavam bahutaram ca a diṭṭha pubbam
cittatthare ratha vare sita vāji yutte
antar uva bhumi pati dhātu gharam
mā ārāma vāsim anurādha pura upakaṇṭhe
thero tahim mahati bhikkhu gaṇe pana ekaḥ
pucchittha saḥ nara varaḥ puna bhikkhu saṅgham

original: Sabbe’pi te atha nikāya nivāsi bhikkhū,
analyzed: sabbe api te atha nikāya nivāsi bhikkhū
añña uñña bhinna vacanesu ca tesu rājā
na iva abhinandi na paṭikkhipi kiñci vākyam

original: Rājā avo ca puna bhikkhugaṇassa majjhe;
analyzed: rājā avo ca puna bhikkhu gaṇassa majjhe
attā anurūpam ayam eva munin dadhātu
ṭhānam khaṇena sayam eva gamissati iti
sajjetum āha nagaram ca vihāra maggam
vyaggha ādi rūpa khacitāni ca toraṇāni
vīthi vasanta vana rāji samāna vaṇṇā
jātā su jāta kadalī taru mālikā ahi
saṃsūcayanti ca satam nava puṇṇa kumbhā
sagga apavagga sukham icchitam ijjhati iti
aññe janā surabhi cuṇṇa bharam vahantā
vissajji phussa ratham aṭṭhita sārathim tam
tasmin rathe jaladhi piṭṭhi gatā iva pote

original: Tuṭṭhā tahiṃ yatigaṇā manujā ca sabbe,
analyzed: tuṭṭhā tahim yati gaṇāḥ manujā ca sabbe
dvārena saḥ ratha varaḥ bahi nikkhamitvā
ṭhāne tahim dasana dhātu varam jinassa
sa ānandi vandi jana maṅgala gītakehi
brahma amara ādi janita amita sādhuvāde
sa a danta dhātu sa si khaṇḍa samāna vaṇṇā
keva anayum saka saka ābharaṇāni geham
ke vā na buddha mahimam abhipatthayiṃsu
dhātum vihāra mahay uttaram eva netvā
pūjam vidhātum anuvat śaram eva rūpam
rājā atha kitti sirimegha samavhayaḥ saḥ
te buddha dāsa pamukhāḥ vasudhā adhināthā
saddhā dayā adhika guṇa ābharaṇa abhirāmā
satthārā sambhatattham purimatara bhave sampajānam pajānam
sambodhim tassa sabba āsava vigama karim saddahanto dahanto
nibbāṇam santam icche ti bhava bhaya pariccāga hetum gahetum
takka āgama ādi kusalena visāra dena
saddhā dhanena sa khilena ca dhamma kitti
vaṃsaḥ kataḥ nikhila dassi pabhāva dīpaḥ
kāle pavassatu ghanaḥ nikhilā pajā api
